dcterms:description: ICDAR 2017 MLT dataset contains 68,613 training instances and 16,255 validation instances from 6 scripts and 9 languages, including Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Bangla, Arabic, Italian, English, French, and German. The dataset presents challenges such as blur, occlusion, and distortion.
dcterms:title: MLT17

dcterms:description: ICDAR 2019 MLT dataset consists of 89,177 text instances from 7 scripts. The dataset is used for training and testing multilingual scene text detection and recognition.
dcterms:title: MLT19
